rows.label: qst630406_msg0001
rows.name: *Huff* So strong... *Puff*

rows.label: qst630406_msg0002
rows.name: We never stood a chance...

rows.label: qst630406_msg0003
rows.name: Do what you want with us...

rows.label: qst630406_msg0004
rows.name:
But you're a fool if you
think you can make us talk!

rows.label: qst630406_msg0005
rows.name: Ah... I see...

rows.label: qst630406_msg0006
rows.name:
So we're not fighting with
the Superbians, then...

rows.label: qst630406_msg0007
rows.name:
Thanks for coming to get us out.
Appreciate you doin' that for us.

rows.label: qst630406_msg0008
rows.name:
But I got one more thing I
gotta do before I head home.

rows.label: qst630406_msg0009
rows.name:
Since you were followin'
us, I guess you saw the
grave a while back, huh?

rows.label: qst630406_msg0010
rows.name:
So you did... Yeah, that
was one of our guys.

rows.label: qst630406_msg0011
rows.name: Our squad leader, Bonard.

rows.label: qst630406_msg0012
rows.name:
We merc types, we like to bury our
dead where they fell. It's our way of
sayin' goodbye, sendin' em off well.

rows.label: qst630406_msg0013
rows.name:
But me? That ain't enough for me. I
like to put a man's soul to rest by
taking down the bastard that killed 'em.

rows.label: qst630406_msg0014
rows.name:
So we chased after the dirty
rats that killed Bonard, but...

rows.label: qst630406_msg0015
rows.name: It didn't turn out so well for us.

rows.label: qst630406_msg0016
rows.name:
With four of us we still lost
a man. So goin' against 'em
with three was real bad.

rows.label: qst630406_msg0017
rows.name:
So we decided to come back to
camp to rest up, so to speak.

rows.label: qst630406_msg0018
rows.name:
You're sayin' you guys will
avenge Bonard for us?

rows.label: qst630406_msg0019
rows.name: I don't know what to say... Thank you.

rows.label: qst630406_msg0020
rows.name:
Bonard's killer should
be somewhere up ahead.

rows.label: qst630406_msg0021
rows.name:
We'll wait back by his grave,
pay some respects and all.

rows.label: qst630406_msg0022
rows.name:
I'll be hoping for good news, but
don't go dyin' yourself now.
